wikipedia_page.main: William Milligan (15 March 1821 – 11 December 1893) was a renowned Scottish theologian.  He studied at the University of Halle in Germany, and eventually became a professor at the University of Aberdeen.  He is best known for his commentary on the Revelation of St. John.  He also wrote two other well-known books that are classics:  The Resurrection of our Lord and The Ascension of our Lord.
